attributes.action: vote of no confidence in gordon brown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: labour have made promise after promise on how they intend to help the british people so far taxes have risen every year along with other things i ask you to sign this petition and get gordon brown to step down as prime minister for this country while it still exists as a major nation

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
